attributes.action: Support the BBC so it doesnt have to sell its Television Centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A national monument in the Television centre please help  to get the government to support the BBC so it can continue using the Television Centre, they cannot be allowed to sell it.It means to much to this country.
But to do this by their own means not by increasing the Licence Fee, for the good and pride of the nation.
